bibl.title: Economic Change and the Transition to Late Antiquity.
bibl.note: I. Possible approaches. - II. Agri deserti and taxation. - III. A note on archaeological sources. - IV. Change in the Western Empire. - V. Change in the Eastern Empire [pp. 40-43: Egypt; figg. 6-8: numbers of documentary papyri]. - VI. The evidence of minting and coin finds. - VIII. Legislative activity. - VIII. Land and population. - IX. Conclusion.
